FAQs.question: How will OrSem happen this year?
FAQs.answer: We are pleased to announce that this year’s OrSem will be held fully ONSITE! More information about OrSem Mithi will be sent to your student emails.

FAQs.question: When is OrSem?
FAQs.answer: OrSem Mithi will be held during the week of August 5-9, 2024.

FAQs.question: I’m not a part of the official batch group, what do I do?
FAQs.answer: You can access the group through a link that will be provided in the freshie letter sent to your emails. Note that membership requests will be validated in line with the official list of freshmen from the Registrar's Office. So don’t forget to answer the questions appropriately before requesting to join!

FAQs.question: Is there ADMU OrSem Merch for sale?
FAQs.answer: You may pre-order Mithi Merch until August 1 via the Merchandise tab on this website, or at tinyurl.com/OrSem2024MerchPreOrder. There will also be merch on sale during OrSem proper itself!

FAQs.question: Is there a possibility of OrSem getting suspended?
FAQs.answer: Rest assured that we are staying updated with the current events and will be heavily informing the way we conduct OrSem this year. Further updates will be coursed on our official pages, website, and through email, if the need arises.

FAQs.question: Is it required for us to attend OrSem?
FAQs.answer: No, OrSem is not a requirement, however, you are highly encouraged to join to better facilitate your introduction and orientation to the Ateneo de Manila University community.

FAQs.question: What if I can’t attend a certain OrSem event/day?
FAQs.answer: For updates and reminders, you may coordinate with your blockmates for anything you may have missed.

FAQs.question: Can I join another block’s OrSem activities?
FAQs.answer: All OrSem activities will be conducted and grouped by your respective blocks. O-Night, however, is not considered a block activity.

FAQs.question: What should we wear during OrSem?
FAQs.answer: Sleeved t-shirt with your school's color, denim pants that are at least ankle-length, and closed rubber shoes. School colors are mentioned in the Freshies Letter via the first email we sent!

FAQs.question: I won’t be officially enrolled before OrSem. Can I still attend?
FAQs.answer: You will need to bring a signed waiver during registration. Kindly email orsem.college@student.ateneo.edu for more details.
